  • Constructor Details

    • ServiceFTP

      public ServiceFTP(String username, Rol rol)
      Constructor for ServiceFTP
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the logged-in user
      rol - Role object of the user

  • Method Details

    • makeDirectory

      public boolean makeDirectory(String path) throws IOException
      Creates a new directory on the FTP server.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the directory to be created.
      Returns:
      true if the directory was created successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs or the directory already exists.

    • listAllFiles

      public org.apache.commons.net.ftp.FTPFile[] listAllFiles()
      Lists all files in the current working directory.
      Returns:
      An array of FTPFile objects representing the files in the directory.

    • changeDirectory

      public boolean changeDirectory(String directoryName)
      Changes the current working directory on the FTP server.
      Parameters:
      directoryName - The name of the directory to change to.
      Returns:
      true if the directory change was successful, false otherwise.

    • changeDirectoryUp

      public boolean changeDirectoryUp()
      Changes the working directory to the parent directory.
      Returns:
      true if the directory change was successful, false otherwise.

    • getCurrentDirectory

      public String getCurrentDirectory()
      Retrieves the current working directory path.
      Returns:
      The current working directory path as a String.

    • uploadFile

      public boolean uploadFile(String localFilePath, String remoteFilePath)
      Uploads a local file to the FTP server.
      Parameters:
      localFilePath - The path of the local file to upload.
      remoteFilePath - The path on the server where the file should be stored.
      Returns:
      true if the upload was successful, false otherwise.

    • downloadFile

      public boolean downloadFile(String remoteFilePath, String localFilePath)
      Downloads a file from the FTP server to the local machine.
      Parameters:
      remoteFilePath - The path of the file on the FTP server.
      localFilePath - The path on the local machine where the file should be saved.
      Returns:
      true if the download was successful, false otherwise.

    • deleteFile

      public boolean deleteFile(String path)
      Deletes a file or directory on the FTP server.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the file or directory to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise.

    • renameFile

      public boolean renameFile(String remoteFrom, String remoteTo)
      Renames a file or directory on the FTP server.
      Parameters:
      remoteFrom - The current name/path of the file.
      remoteTo - The new name/path for the file.
      Returns:
      true if the rename was successful, false otherwise.

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the FTP connection and logs out.

    • calculateDirectorySize

      public long calculateDirectorySize(String directoryName)
      Calculates the total size of a directory recursively.
      Parameters:
      directoryName - The name of the directory to calculate.
      Returns:
      The total size in bytes.

    • setTableModel

      public void setTableModel(FTPTableModel tableModel)
      Set the table model and initialize notifications if not already initialized. This must be called after creating the FTPTableModel.
      Parameters:
      tableModel - The FTP table model to update when notifications are received

    • disconnectNotifications

      public void disconnectNotifications()
      Disconnect from the notification system

    • notifyFTPChange

      public void notifyFTPChange(String action, String filePath)
      Notify all clients about an FTP change This method should be called after successful FTP operations (upload, delete, rename, etc.)
      Parameters:
      action - The type of action (UPLOAD, DELETE, RENAME, etc.)
      filePath - The affected file path

    • setNotificationController

      public void setNotificationController(NotificationController controller)
      Set the notification controller for broadcasting FTP changes
      Parameters:
      controller - The notification controller
